About Me
Programming is my Passion

I am Aayush Bastola, a programming enthusiast hailing from Pokhara, Nepal. With a deep passion for technology, My passion for programming extends to various languages and technologies, including HTML and Python. In HTML, I enjoy the process of crafting the structure and layout of web pages, utilizing tags and attributes to create a visually appealing and interactive user interface. Python, on the other hand, captivates me with its versatility and simplicity, enabling me to develop powerful and efficient solutions for a wide range of applications. Whether I am working on front-end development with HTML or diving into back-end logic with Python, the ability to bring ideas to life through coding fills me with excitement and fuels my passion for programming.

Photography as my hobby

Photography is a cherished hobby of mine, where I indulge my creativity and appreciate the beauty of the world through capturing captivating visuals. As an enthusiast, I enjoy composing shots and experimenting with different angles to capture moments that evoke emotions and tell meaningful stories. While I may not consider myself an expert, I constantly explore and learn new techniques to improve my skills. Photography allows me to express my unique perspective and share my appreciation for the world around me with others. It is a joyful and fulfilling hobby that brings me great satisfaction and allows me to capture moments of beauty in my own way.
